lines.speaker: Becky
lines.text: yeah, I'll be seeing you the minute I refresh!

lines.speaker: Becky
lines.text: are you going to be okay getting home?

lines.speaker: Zak
lines.text: yeah, I'm sure the orb can find me a Michael or three to take me back through the lines.

settings.title: Credits
paragraphs: "Packetsphere" is a collaboration of [Zak Argabrite](https://www.zakargabrite.com/) and [Becky Brown](https://becky-brown.org/), and was create as part of the first [BROWSER Sound Festival](https://browsersound.com/), June 11 - 13, 2021.
The majority of the gifs are from the Internet Archive's [gifcities](https://gifcities.org/) project. Most of the other graphics link to their source of origin.
If you have questions, ask them at the presentation on Sunday!
